transcript.text: "Hey Squeezie!
McFly and Carlito have children
Norman has a child, Amixem too
When will you?
Wait!!
Listen, I receive an incalculable number of messages from people saying:
"Hey squeezie, when are you having a kid, too?"
But... I'm only 23, that's not what you say to me
You're putting a lot of pressure on me for something that won't happen
For at least 7 years in my opinion.
Go say that to Cyprien, who is 30 years old
or Natoo who is 34.
Or even Pierre Croce who is 32.
But me?? Leave me alone!
Why I'm not ready for have a child, friends, is because
I think... they are demonic
They are demonic entities. I fear children, I'm scared of children. OKAY!
They can be the cutest and coolest
Or they can be cunning and perverted
Who are ready to get whatever they want
I have a lot of trouble with kids in general
It's not even like "for me having a kid is rough"
It's kids in general I have a problem with
Because I'm not ready to make concessions, or accept things, or inflict harm upon myself, uh.....
I just realized I have a really sad vision of parenthood for the moment
But I'm young... f*ck, it's normal
So I did a little test, okay?
Today, we will watch videos of kids
it's a little sketchy said like that
Don't worry, normal videos of kids (he used the wrong form of 'normal' in french and corrects himself)
So when you don't even know how to use the word "normal" it's not a good time in your life to have a child
doing little actions that we did ourselves at their age
but if you are old enough to have a child, you will tolerate these actions
which is rarely my case ... but OK . According to you:
"Hey when are you having a kid, Squeezie?"
I'm putting on the headphones, let's GO. This is gonna bother me I already know
*reads*
Because of another kid, obviously
oh no
look at this... if my daughter did that, what do I do?
So much responsibility... TO THE DUNGEONS! TO THE DUNGEONS RIGHT NOW
How do you approve of that? Or tell her that is not okay?
Or put a bandage on the wound that must have created on this young man's heart?
What is this bandage made of?
oh no... He...
So...
I really thought he was going to hit his child
Why?! because in his place I would not have stayed so calm
even if an object fell on the computer's power button I would be angry at the object and I would break it
You see there, we just saw why I don't want a kid
If we had to show one video it's that one
The only time somebody turned off my computer while I was using it, I got 20 stitches on my hand
But there is a cute side, he wants his father's attention
and he understood that when he does that he gets it
Because his dad spends far too much time playing video games
and he lost his job and can no longer provide for his family
So this is a way for his smart child to make him understand that he needs to get himself together

It's beautiful. Am I making a movie?
Maybe
*reads*
that's like me when I was younger
How does she know?
how does she know that her little brother took the headphones?
he broke them?!
That's horrible!
How he can say to himself " it's okay" "it wasn't me" ?
he broke them in 2 places. He fixed 1/2
not far from perfect. he should have fixed the 2nd too
That's amazing, I have an anecdote of me doing exactly the same thing
when I was younger, exactly the same
I was playing on my father's laptop
and I was just losing a lot and I kept losing
like now, actually
And I went like that..
on the keybord because I was raging
And dude, one of the keys was gone
It was truly gone, like out the window with its little legs it left
it said "I'm done I am suffering"
And exactly like this kid, I took the key and I put it back
I closed the computer and put it back like that
all while knowing that this was my father's work computer
what happened the next day? I was woken up very early by my father
*reads*
Look at this. She is diabolical. LOoK!
I'm putting this video in the horror thread category. I'm not joking.
So this is it ...being rich. That's what she's thinking in the presence of the deliveryman who has no idea what's happening.
And we're were called delinquents when we stole our parent's phones to play (some old game)
Dude! Look the new generation
They've advanced. They've inovated like no one before them.
oh damn we're in a shonen
Do you feel it? You feel what's happening?
"he is more powerful than me and he knows that... But I will grow, and I will take my revenge..."
TO BE CONTINUED....
You see there for example, how you can say "no problem"?
I think when you are a parent you accept things that for me, are shocking right now
Like the kid who smacked the ball in his head, I would run after him
I would take him by his arms and I say "Why did you do that?!"
"NEVER AGAIN YOU HEAR ME NEVER AGAIN!!!!"
Sorry, but like in a wise and benevolent way
*OMG*
Jumpin on his dad's mercedes.... what pleasure!
Or does he want to break the car for revenge? Or he thinks it will help him jump higher like a trampoline?
I want to understand help me understand. To understand the mystery of childhood
*reads*
It's a wedding , I hope the foolishness is not major
He doesn't give a f*ck, it's impressive
but it's cute there is not a big problem
it's innocent he saw a big tissue and he wanted to jump in it will cushion my fall...
It's sweet..
OHLALA What's happening??
This does not mean I'm ready to have a child reassure me
*reads*
Shaq is a man of 2,16m
and he weighs 147kg
And he can f*ck your mom at anytime
So this kid is scared of nothing
His face... That did not make him laugh at all....
but he can't scold the little boy cause he is on a TV program
it can be frowned upon cause it's not his son
nice shitty situation
Damn, I would bury myself if that was my son, I would bury myself
How embarrassing, horrible. I think I am sensitive to other people looking
and the judgment they will have of me because of my son's behavior
I feel like that's got to be something really stressfull when you are a parent
You're scared that they will do something embarrassing, or misbehave
And that sends a message to people that since he's doing that I must not be raising him right
and I'm uneducated
I feel like that would drive me crazy, I would go crazy.
*reads*
I don't understand this title
There is no coordination between this person and her children.
I'm horrible for saying that
But we're watching a grand moment of misunderstanding
Oh no... she really fell down, poor thing
And what he's doing? Is he yelling at her? Why is he doing that with his arms?
Is he accusing her of being responsible? I don't understand. I don't understand this video
it makes me anxious. next please
oh no it's the same thing as the first video, the one that hurts
The one that makes you immediatly regret having a child
Oh no he's gonna to mess it all up, he's gonna ruin everything  :(
This father who probably devoted 2 hours of his time to set up a perfect row of dominos
And who was looking forward to giving the pleasure of knocking them down to his daughter
So she could enjoy it
There are so many things wrong with that.
Is it me, or is this weapon 7 times too powerful for how old these boys are.
Dude! They have a f*cking automatic bb gun that seems to fire super powerfully
And they're shooting at the CAMERAAAA!! THE IDIOTS
I remember back then I was a big fan of bb guns
And I had bought one for 15 euros in something a bit hidden like it came from a weird place in the store
Like someplace really hidden
But it was a bolt, meaning you had to go "CRAC-CRAC" before shooting
"CRAC-CRAC" I'm such an old person. Okay I'm old enough to have a child, okay!
What is he doing?
What is he doing?
What is this kinda dumb adult in a kid's body?
Nothing it's logical. Not the person who is filming and lets everything happen under his supervision
Neither the child's own behavior. Unless it is very logical to him,
and I as an adult do not understand what he is engineering
That's surely it, the bastard!
it's really Malcolm
It's really touching and naive, when you're a little kid your only defense is to lie at any cost
Even if all the evidence proves that you did it, you definitely don't want to admit it, you want to hide it.
like the boy who broke his sister's headphones
It's cute I will make a child tonight
Oh you see? You see their true nature? We saw it!
It's the end of this video. Please leave me alone about the children
I don't want a child right now. We will make a video in 7 years
when I have one, where will I watch this video and I will say
" OH LALA how I have changed, I was bad before"
I hope you enjoyed this video, and that it taught you a lesson
please stop asking me "when is the child"
it's putting pressure on me that I should not have at my age
And what's crazy is that some of you really did grow up with me
There are some of you who were 16 watching my videos when I was 17

And one day... I will be 30 and you will be 31
( 🤔 )
And on that day we will all come and rewatch this video, believe me it will happen.
Anyway, bravo to all the parents of the world who tolerate their children's nonsense
And give them all the love of the world and the opportunities to succeed in life
I find that very beautiful, I admit that I am touched by that, it's amazing
Even when I see McFly and Carlito and the love they give to their children I'm touched
But I don't want that to concern me for the moment OKAY
The lesson has taught. This video is for you and no one else.
I leave you
I don't want kids!

Do you think they understood the message that I do not want them
